item.title: Analysis on Northern Hemishpere temperature
item.description: Climate change and temperature anomalies The aim of this project was to define temperature anomalies within the Northern Hemisphere considering as a base period the one between 1951 and 1980. In order to carry out my observations, I have utilized data provided by the NASA’s Goddard Institute for Space Studies. weather <- read_csv("https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/tabledata_v3/NH.Ts+dSST.csv", skip = 1, na = "***") tidyweather <- weather %>% select(Year:Dec) %>% pivot_longer(cols=c('Jan':'Dec'),names_to="Month",values_to="delta") Plots I have plotted the data using a time-series scatter plot, and adding a trendline.

item.title: Voting in the UN General Assembly
item.description: Let’s take a look at the voting history of countries in the United Nations General Assembly. I will be using data from the unvotes package. I will make use of the tidyverse and lubridate packages for the analysis, and the DT package for interactive display of tabular output. Data The unvotes package provides three datasets I can work with: un_roll_calls, un_roll_call_issues, and un_votes. Each of these datasets contains a variable called rcid, the roll call id, which can be used as a unique identifier to join them with each other.
